resources.string: Enter a username that will be displayed when joining chat rooms. This name will be used when sending message and can be changed later in settings.

This app needs access to your devices location as well as the ability to discover nearby devices. The location permissions will not be used for any tracking purposes and are required by the WiFi Direct apis to locate other devices. The app will also need to access the network state to monitor the connection between other devices. Click the below button to accept the permissions from the popup. If the button does not work they may need to be changed in the settings.
what is the username used for?
tap to select a profile picture
